alert.note: Alert for Graham; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Swain and Graham Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Lenoir City to 7 miles southeast of Madisonville to 3 miles northwest of Murphy to 6 miles east of Blue Ridge. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Robbinsville, Town Of Santeetlah, Fontana Village, Lake Santeetlah, Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, Tapoco, Cheoah and Deals Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
